scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm --filter api-gateway dev" "pnpm --filter ingestion dev" "pnpm --filter prediction dev"
scripts.migration: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm prisma sh -c "npm install -g prisma && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --schema=/app/prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=/app/prisma/schema.prisma"
